record.description: A view of McDonald Observatory in the Davis Mountains of West Texas. The observatory's 82-inch reflecting telescope is the third largest in the world.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: This photograph was originally included in a booklet given out for the dedication of McDonald Observatory. This booklet can be located in the archival building files.Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations.
